DOC.brief_title: EYE-TRAC Advance : Technology Verification ( ETA-TV ) Cohort 1
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator propose prospectively study cohort 18-25-year-old athlete . Athletes test EYE-SYNC eye-tracking device prior start athletic practice competition ( pre-test ) conclusion practice/competition ( post-test ) . The investigator hope understand eye-tracking score effect exercise non-concussive bodily contact commonly incur athletic play .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Athletes age 18 25yearsold . 20/30 good eyesight ( correct vision allow ) . English fluency . Exclusion criterion Note : Under Cohort 1 , Athletes condition list exclude study . They enrol subject data analyze separately subject endorse significant medical hx neurological , eyesight , psychiatric category . Clinical diagnosis neurological condition include follow : Stroke , Multiple Sclerosis , Epilepsy , Brain Tumor/Cancer , Nystagmus and/or major neurological condition . Clinical diagnosis follow eyesight abnormality : Uncorrected Amblyopia , Uncorrected Myopia , Uncorrected Presbyopia , Uncorrected Farsightedness , Uncorrected Astigmatism . Psychiatric history follow : 1 . Clinical diagnosis psychotic disorder , bipolar disorder lifetime 2 . Clinical diagnosis ADHD ADD Lifetime 3 . Clinical diagnosis major depressive disorder within last year 4 . Clinical diagnosis substance abuse disorder within last year 5 . Clinical diagnosis major anxiety disorder within last year MEDICATION 6 . Requires use psychotropic medication .
